title: The Traka 360 Results: Kongstad Soloes to Victory, Two in a Row for Migoń
content:
The Dane dropped the hammer with more than 100km to go to win the men's edition, Migoń attacks late to make it two in a row in Europe's biggest gravel race.

Read the full article at The Traka 360 Results: Kongstad Soloes to Victory, Two in a Row for Migoń on Velo.
author: ahood
